com.luke.lukef.lukeapp.fragments

Class NewSubmissionFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.luke.lukef.lukeapp.fragments.NewSubmissionFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener

    public class NewSubmissionFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener
    Handles the new submission screen, includes sending the submissions, dispatching the camera intent and listening to the category pop up clicks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.app.Fragment

        android.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, android.app.Fragment.SavedState
